Key Match Events: Marcus Semien hit a two-run home run in the ninth inning
Mitch Garver's RBI single in the seventh inning
Post-Match Reflections: Corey Seager won the World Series MVP award for the second time
The Texas Rangers won their first World Series title after 63 years and 12 years since being one strike away from winning against the St Louis Cardinals
Miscellaneous Highlights: Nathan Eovaldi threw six scoreless innings
The Rangers won all three games in Arizona during the series
